alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 15 at 9:25PM CDT until March 16 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, and Davis. * WHEN...Until 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
